result.execSummary:
Darrin Carlson was extradited to another county, state or jurisdiction. Extradition means Darrin Carlson was accused or convicted of an offense in another county, state or jurisdiction and was taken there to face their charge(s) or conviction.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Darrin Carlson

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Defendant Darrin Carlson in court, in custody.  Stephen C. Dorrance appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  CW-clerk 1:56 pm. Gov's warrant is proceeding.  Polk County has no hold.  Bond is not being set.  1:59 pm adj.

Defendant Darrin Carlson in court with attorney Daniel E. Firkus.  Defendant Darrin Carlson in custody.  Stephen C. Dorrance appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  RL/CW-clerk 10:14 am. Firkus- Motion for release. 14ct111. Ct REMOVES BOND associated with hold in WI. Ct finds in 14CT111- 114 days credit, time is subject to WR and GT. No further time to sit at this time. Must report to probation. 10:27 am adj.

HAND-WRITTEN:  Stephen Dorrance appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Dan Firkus appeared for the Defendant Darrin Carlson.  Defendant Darrin Carlson in custody.  CW-clerk 1:06 pm  Def not waiving, lack of understanding.  Bond cont. 1:08 pm adj.
Report in support of probable cause for arrest. Request for criminal complaint.

HAND-WRITTEN:  Stephen Dorrance appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Brian Smestad appeared specially for Defendant Darrin Carlson.  Defendant Darrin Carlson in custody.  CW-clerk 1:13 pm  Def not waiving extradition.  CT sets Bond.  $1,000 Cash Bond.  Return 6/17/15, at 1:00 pm. 1:22 pm adj.
